26 #ifndef REACTPHYSICS3D_MEMORY_MANAGER_H
27 #define REACTPHYSICS3D_MEMORY_MANAGER_H
28 
29 // Libraries
30 #include "memory/DefaultAllocator.h"
31 #include "memory/DefaultPoolAllocator.h"
32 #include "memory/MemoryAllocator.h"
33 #include "memory/DefaultSingleFrameAllocator.h"
34 
36 namespace reactphysics3d {
37 
38 // Declarations
39 class MemoryAllocator;
40 
41 // Class MemoryManager
46 class MemoryManager {
47 
48  private:
49 
51  static DefaultAllocator mDefaultAllocator;
52 
54  static DefaultSingleFrameAllocator mDefaultSingleFrameAllocator;
55 
57  static DefaultPoolAllocator mDefaultPoolAllocator;
58 
60  static MemoryAllocator* mBaseAllocator;
61 
63  static SingleFrameAllocator* mSingleFrameAllocator;
64 
66  static MemoryAllocator* mPoolAllocator;
67 
68  public:
69 
71  enum class AllocationType {
72  Base, // Base memory allocator
73  Pool, // Memory pool allocator
74  Frame, // Single frame memory allocator
75  };
76 
78  MemoryManager() = default;
79 
81  ~MemoryManager() = default;
82 
84  void* allocate(AllocationType allocationType, size_t size);
85 
87  void release(AllocationType allocationType, void* pointer, size_t size);
88 
90  MemoryAllocator& getPoolAllocator();
91 
93  SingleFrameAllocator& getSingleFrameAllocator();
94 
96  static MemoryAllocator& getBaseAllocator();
97 
99  static void setBaseAllocator(MemoryAllocator* memoryAllocator);
100 
102  static void setSingleFrameAllocator(SingleFrameAllocator* singleFrameAllocator);
103 
105  static void setPoolAllocator(MemoryAllocator* poolAllocator);
106 
108  void resetFrameAllocator();
109 };
110 
111 // Allocate memory of a given type
112 inline void* MemoryManager::allocate(AllocationType allocationType, size_t size) {
113 
114  switch (allocationType) {
115  case AllocationType::Base: return mBaseAllocator->allocate(size);
116  case AllocationType::Pool: return mPoolAllocator->allocate(size);
117  case AllocationType::Frame: return mSingleFrameAllocator->allocate(size);
118  }
119 
120  return nullptr;
121 }
122 
123 // Release previously allocated memory.
124 inline void MemoryManager::release(AllocationType allocationType, void* pointer, size_t size) {
125 
126  switch (allocationType) {
127  case AllocationType::Base: mBaseAllocator->release(pointer, size); break;
128  case AllocationType::Pool: mPoolAllocator->release(pointer, size); break;
129  case AllocationType::Frame: mSingleFrameAllocator->release(pointer, size); break;
130  }
131 }
132 
133 // Return the pool allocator
134 inline MemoryAllocator& MemoryManager::getPoolAllocator() {
135  return *mPoolAllocator;
136 }
137 
138 // Return the single frame stack allocator
139 inline SingleFrameAllocator& MemoryManager::getSingleFrameAllocator() {
140  return *mSingleFrameAllocator;
141 }
142 
143 // Return the base memory allocator
144 inline MemoryAllocator& MemoryManager::getBaseAllocator() {
145  return *mBaseAllocator;
146 }
147 
148 // Set the base memory allocator
149 inline void MemoryManager::setBaseAllocator(MemoryAllocator* baseAllocator) {
150  mBaseAllocator = baseAllocator;
151 }
152 
153 // Set the base memory allocator
154 inline void MemoryManager::setSingleFrameAllocator(SingleFrameAllocator* singleFrameAllocator) {
155  mSingleFrameAllocator = singleFrameAllocator;
156 }
157 
158 // Set the pool memory allocator
159 inline void MemoryManager::setPoolAllocator(MemoryAllocator* poolAllocator) {
160  mPoolAllocator = poolAllocator;
161 }
162 
163 // Reset the single frame allocator
164 inline void MemoryManager::resetFrameAllocator() {
165  mSingleFrameAllocator->reset();
166 }
167 
168 }
169 
170 #endif
